author: mverzett
body:
This PR introduces the DeepCSV and DeepCMVA (disabled) taggers into the RECO sequences. 

   * The tagger outputs are not stored in the default PAT sequence yet as they would make it crash due to the lack of the TagInfo in the AOD event. All basic tests on my side are passing.
   * This PR depends on [external data](https://github.com/cms-data/RecoBTag-Combined/pull/4) being available in the IB.
   * @slava77 suggested memory and CPU footprint checks, I was hoping jenkins would take care of it.
   * We would like to back-port this PR (disabling the changes to the RECO format) once this is approved. Can I already make a backport PR?
title: Deep flavour PR
